name: Dr Alexander's greatest plan
description:
Simple platformer about doing villain' stuff like step in the grass and pop child's balloons.

Move and jump with the arrows.
Restart the level with 1
Restart the game with 2

Made in 72 hours for the Gamerev gamejam.

Art by: Flordebuenuda

Music by:  ...
Main theme by Waltz
SFX and intro theme belong to Retroperspective music pack by JDB 

Programming by: Waltz
